channel.title: Network Analysis on Open Source Patent Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Network Analysis on Open Source Patent Analytics

item.title: Network Visualisation with Gephi
item.description: Introduction This article focuses on visualising patent data in networks using the open source software Gephi. Gephi is one of a growing number of free network analysis and visualisation tools with others including Cytoscape, Tulip, GraphViz, Pajek for Windows, and VOSviewer to name but a few. In addition, network visualisation packages are available for R and Python. We have chosen to focus on Gephi because it is a good all round network visualisation tool that is quite easy to use and to learn.
